full_text:
TED'S SHEDS DELIVERY AGREEMENT

Sold to:
JEFFERY EPSTEIN
358 EL BRILLO WAY
PALM BEACH, FL 33480-
H: (561) 818-8361

Dated: 12/16/2004
Contract #: 6200-2053
Building/Size: CLASSIC - 10W x 10L
Product: SHED

Congratulations on your purchase of your Ted's Sheds product! Your Ted's Sheds product was constructed to the highest quality standards. Ted's Sheds offers free delivery, installation, blocking, and anchoring of your product; provided, however, that at the time of delivery, there is sufficient legal access to the site.

To assist you in your enjoyment of your product, Ted's Sheds offers free site inspection to inspect your property for proper access. If land access is not available, Ted's Sheds offers a free estimate for crane service.

(Please choose one and initial below.)
Yes, I do want Ted's Sheds to inspect my property for proper access. _______ initial here.
X No, I do not want Ted's Sheds or a free crane-service estimate to inspect my property and understand the charges for Additional service described below. _______ initial here.

The dimensions of the product you have purchased are 10 feet wide Ã— 10 feet long. You agree to provide, at the time of delivery, clear, continual, unrestricted, and legal access, free and clear of any obstacles whatsoever, 12 feet wide commencing at the street, highway, or other public access and terminating at the precise location where you instruct us to place your product.

Ted's Sheds will not be responsible for clearing any obstacle in order to deliver your product. You indemnify and hold Ted's Sheds harmless from and against any damage sustained to your property or by any person whomsoever with respect to the delivery, installation, blocking, and anchoring of your product to the precise location where you instruct us to place your product.

Ted's Sheds also shall not be responsible for compliance with any zoning, building, housing, environmental, fire, safety, health, or other governmental law, statute, ordinance, regulation, order, requirement, or other authority, federal, state, county, municipal, special district, or otherwise. Ted's Sheds shall not be responsible for compliance with any private land use restriction, such as restrictive covenants, easements, rights-of-way, architectural review, building restriction, condominium, homeowner, master, or other association rules or regulations. You shall obtain any permits, approvals, and consents by any person whomsoever required for the installation of your product. All such governmental authorities, private land use restrictions, permits, approvals and consents, collectively, the "Fesitiction."

Ted's Sheds will rely upon your instructions as to placement of the product on your site in relation to setbacks and other restrictions. You will be at the installation site at the time of delivery of the product and will pay any balance owing on the purchase contract at that time.

The anchors to secure your product are driven approximately 3 feet into the ground. You must inform us whether there are any underground utilities near the precise location where your product will be located. At your request, Ted's Sheds will contact the proper utilities marking service at no charge to you.

Ted's Sheds standard delivery hours of operation are Monday - Saturday, 8:00 AM to 3:30 PM.

Ted's Sheds may need to reschedule the delivery of your building when an unexpected circumstance arises. You agree that any rescheduling of your delivery will not void the sales agreement or cause any discount to the total sales price.

CHARGES FOR ADDITIONAL SERVICE

You shall pay Ted's Sheds a minimum charge of $250.00 to revisit any installation site to move or re-anchor your product to comply with any restriction. You shall pay Ted's Sheds $250.00 for each subsequent installation attempt and each revisit to the site for any reason whatsoever. If you refuse delivery of your product for non-accessibility or because of any Restriction, your deposit is non-refundable.

Ted's Sheds acts solely as liaison between you and any crane service provider. Coordinating the scheduling of crane service and installation of your new product will be done by Ted's Sheds as a courtesy to you. You will contract with the crane service provider directly at no cost to Ted's Sheds. Ted's Sheds shall not be responsible for any damage done by the crane service provider to any person, your property, or any other property.

The words "you" and "your" used herein shall mean the undersigned customer. You have read and understand this Delivery Agreement and agree to be bound by the terms hereof.

Jeffrey Epstein 12/16/04
CUSTOMER'S SIGNATURE DATE

07/26/17 Page 52 of 100 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00031991

additional_notes: The document is a delivery agreement between Ted's Sheds and Jeffery Epstein. It includes terms and conditions for the delivery and installation of a shed.
